answers.answer: Google search on 'diabetes and food allergies' returned 16,100,000 hits. Lots to read and not enough space here to condense the connection. As you read the links you will see the connection.http://tinyurl.com/diabetes-and-food-allergiesYou might look at this page and eliminate allergy causing foodshttp://diabetes.webmd.com/diabetic-food-list-best-worst-foods

question: Have there been any studies on the correlation between food allergies and diabetes?  I was diagnosed with food allergies many years ago and have recently been diagnosed as prediabetic. I have noticed that my glucose level is higher on days when my allergy symptoms are worse.
title: Food Allergies and Diabetes
